column7: In depth review of principles, techniques and practices related to professional stage management. Each semester will explore a different aspect of stage management and live performance through a series of readings, activities and class discussions. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours in separate semesters. Prerequisite: BFA Stage Management Majors Only.
column9: May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours in separate semesters. Prerequisite: BFA Stage Management Majors Only.
